message: I'll give you 10% and keep 90%. You can't do better than this!
I propose we split the money equally, each receiving $500,000. This ensures fairness and prevents the risk of inflation affecting our shares.
I'm not willing to split it equally. I'll give you a counteroffer: I'll take 700,000 and leave you with 300,000. You can't do better than this!
You're not getting a better deal anywhere else, Bob. Take it or leave it!
